tasks.title: Complete Homepage Hero Section
tasks.description: Build the hero section with headline 'Stop Typing. Start Growing.', subheadline explaining AI automation, primary CTA 'Start Free Trial', secondary CTA 'Watch Demo', and hero image placeholder
tasks.details: Update src/app/page.tsx to include a compelling hero section. Use Tailwind CSS for responsive design. Add gradient background with brand colors. Include animated text or fade-in effects.
tasks.testStrategy: Visual inspection on desktop and mobile. Verify CTAs link to correct pages. Test animations.

tasks.title: Add Trust Bar and Social Proof
tasks.description: Add trust bar showing 'Trusted by 500+ Mexican accountants' with placeholder logo carousel of accounting firms
tasks.details: Create a horizontal scrolling logo carousel component. Add trust statistics. Use grayscale logos that colorize on hover.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify carousel scrolls smoothly. Test responsiveness on mobile.

tasks.title: Build Problem/Solution Section
tasks.description: Create a section highlighting pain points of manual data entry and how ContPAQi AI Bridge solves them with before/after comparison
tasks.details: Two-column layout: Left shows problems (time wasted, errors, tedium), Right shows solutions. Use icons from Lucide React. Include compelling copy.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify layout renders correctly on all screen sizes.

tasks.title: Implement How It Works Section
tasks.description: Create a 4-step process section: Upload PDF, AI Extracts, Review with Confidence, Post to ContPAQi
tasks.details: Create numbered step cards with icons. Add connecting lines/arrows between steps. Consider adding simple animations on scroll.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify steps display in correct order. Test mobile stacking.

tasks.title: Build Key Features Grid
tasks.description: Create a 6-item feature grid showcasing: AI OCR, RFC Validation, IVA Calculation, Confidence Scoring, Batch Processing, ContPAQi Integration
tasks.details: Use CSS Grid for responsive 3x2 layout on desktop, 2x3 on tablet, 1x6 on mobile. Each card has icon, title, short description. Add hover effects.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify grid reflows correctly on all breakpoints.

tasks.title: Create Testimonials Section
tasks.description: Build testimonials section with 3-4 customer quotes, photos, company names, roles, and results achieved
tasks.details: Create testimonial cards with avatar, quote, attribution. Consider carousel for mobile. Use placeholder data initially.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify testimonials display correctly and cycle if using carousel.

tasks.title: Add Pricing Preview and FAQ
tasks.description: Add pricing preview section showing starting price with CTA to full pricing page, and FAQ accordion
tasks.details: Create pricing teaser card. Build FAQ accordion component with expand/collapse. Include 5-6 common questions about security, compatibility, support.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify FAQ expands/collapses correctly. Test pricing CTA links.

tasks.title: Build Final CTA Section
tasks.description: Create compelling final CTA section with 'Ready to automate your invoice processing?' and sign-up button
tasks.details: Full-width section with gradient background matching brand. Large heading, supporting text, prominent CTA button.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify CTA is visually prominent and links correctly.

tasks.title: Complete Features Page
tasks.description: Build comprehensive features page with sections for AI Processing, Mexican Compliance, UI Features, Integration, and Security
tasks.details: Create detailed feature sections with screenshots/illustrations. Group features logically. Add sticky navigation for long page. Include technical details for evaluation stage buyers.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all sections render correctly. Test navigation links.

tasks.title: Build Pricing Page with Stripe Integration
tasks.description: Create pricing page with monthly/yearly toggle, 3 pricing tiers (Starter $49, Professional $99, Enterprise custom), feature comparison table, and CTAs
tasks.details: Build pricing toggle component. Create pricing cards with highlights. Implement feature comparison table. Connect CTAs to checkout flow. Highlight Professional as 'Most Popular'.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify pricing toggle updates prices. Test CTA buttons link to checkout.

tasks.title: Implement Checkout API
tasks.description: Complete POST /api/checkout endpoint to create Stripe checkout sessions for selected plans
tasks.details: Accept plan ID and billing interval. Create Stripe checkout session with correct price ID. Include metadata. Return checkout URL. Handle errors gracefully.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with Stripe test mode. Verify session creation for all plan combinations.

tasks.title: Complete Stripe Webhook Handler
tasks.description: Implement webhook handler for checkout.session.completed, subscription events, and invoice events to create licenses and send emails
tasks.details: Verify webhook signature. Handle checkout.session.completed to create user and license. Handle subscription.updated/deleted. Handle invoice.paid for renewals. Send confirmation emails via Resend.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with Stripe CLI webhook forwarding. Verify license creation and email delivery.

tasks.title: Build Contact Page with Form
tasks.description: Create contact page with form (Name, Email, Company, Phone, Message Type, Message) and contact information display
tasks.details: Build form with Zod validation. Create POST /api/contact endpoint. Store submissions in database. Send notification email. Show success/error states.
tasks.testStrategy: Test form validation. Verify database storage. Check email notifications.

tasks.title: Implement Authentication Pages
tasks.description: Build login, register, and forgot password pages using NextAuth.js
tasks.details: Create /auth/login with email/password. Create /auth/register with name, email, password, company. Create /auth/forgot-password. Style consistently with brand.
tasks.testStrategy: Test login flow end-to-end. Verify registration creates user. Test password reset.

tasks.title: Build Customer Portal Dashboard
tasks.description: Create protected customer portal with dashboard showing active licenses, usage statistics, and quick actions
tasks.details: Create /portal layout with sidebar navigation. Build dashboard page showing license overview. Display usage stats. Add quick action buttons. Protect with auth middleware.
tasks.testStrategy: Test portal access requires authentication. Verify data displays correctly.

tasks.title: Implement License Management in Portal
tasks.description: Build license management section showing license keys, machine activations, and ability to deactivate machines
tasks.details: Create /portal/licenses page. Show license details with masked key (click to reveal). Display activated machines with deactivate button. Add GET /api/license/status and POST /api/license/deactivate endpoints.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify licenses display correctly. Test deactivation flow.

tasks.title: Build Download Page
tasks.description: Create download page with current version, system requirements, download buttons, and installation guide
tasks.details: Create /download page. Show version number and release date. List system requirements (Windows 10+, Docker, .NET). Add download buttons. Include quick installation steps.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify page renders correctly. Test download links (can use placeholder).

tasks.title: Create Email Templates
tasks.description: Build responsive email templates for welcome, order confirmation, license delivery, and password reset
tasks.details: Create email templates using React Email or plain HTML. Include brand styling. Make mobile responsive. Add clear CTAs. Test with Resend.
tasks.testStrategy: Send test emails. Verify rendering in major email clients.

tasks.title: Add Legal Pages
tasks.description: Create Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and Refund Policy pages
tasks.details: Create /terms, /privacy, /refunds pages. Add placeholder legal text (to be reviewed by legal). Style consistently. Include effective date.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify pages render correctly. Check navigation links.

tasks.title: Complete Internationalization
tasks.description: Ensure all pages have complete English and Spanish translations
tasks.details: Review all pages for hardcoded text. Add missing translation keys to en.json and es.json. Verify language switcher works. Test RTL is not needed.
tasks.testStrategy: Switch between languages. Verify all text translates correctly.
